title: Request Invoice Copy
description: A customer's accounting department needs a PDF copy of an invoice from 6 months ago.

tasks.description: Authenticate the user and confirm they have billing permissions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the user is an account admin.

tasks.description: Locate the specific invoice from 6 months ago in the billing history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct historical invoice.

tasks.description: Download the invoice as a PDF and email it to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the requested invoice.
